posts.title: First Post
posts.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
posts.author: Jack Mungai

posts.title: Second Post
posts.content: In the end, its not the years in your life  that count. Its the life in your years.
posts.author: Joseph Ndungu

posts.title: Third Post
posts.content: Believe you can and you are halfway there.
posts.author: James Kihara

posts.title: Fourth Post
posts.content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
posts.author: Florence Nyambura
